Notifications.Name: User Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new user has been added.

Notifications.Name: User Invitation Accepted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new user has accepted their user invitation.

Notifications.Name: User Invitation Deleted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new user invitation has been deleted.

Notifications.Name: User Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a change is made to a user account.

Notifications.Name: User Password Changed
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a change is made to a user's account password.

Notifications.Name: User Profile Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a change is made to a user's account profile.

Notifications.Name: Location Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new location is added.

Notifications.Name: Location Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when location information is changed or a location is disabled.

Notifications.Name: Role Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new custom role is added.

Notifications.Name: Role Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a custom role is updated.

Notifications.Name: Tax Profile Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new tax profile is added.

Notifications.Name: Tax Profile Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a tax profile is changed or disabled.

Notifications.Name: System Defaults Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when system defaults are updated.

Notifications.Name: Integrations Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when changes are made to 3rd party integrations.

Notifications.Name: Lender Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new lender is added.

Notifications.Name: Lender Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when lender information is changed or disabled.

Notifications.Name: Rated Products Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when configuration changes for rated products.

Notifications.Name: Dealer Product Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new dealer product is added.

Notifications.Name: Dealer Product Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a dealer product is changed.

Notifications.Name: Dealer Product Deleted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a dealer product is deleted.

Notifications.Name: Menu Columns Updated
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when menu column configuration changes.

Notifications.Name: Lead Added
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new lead is added.

Notifications.Name: Lead Deleted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a lead is deleted.

Notifications.Name: Quote Created
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new quote is created.

Notifications.Name: Quote Blocked
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote is blocked.

Notifications.Name: Quote Inactive
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote is marked inactive.

Notifications.Name: Quote Deleted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote is deleted.

Notifications.Name: Quote Converted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a quote is converted to a deal.

Notifications.Name: Deal Created
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new deal is created.

Notifications.Name: Deal Blocked
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a deal is blocked.

Notifications.Name: Deal Inactive
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a deal is marked inactive.

Notifications.Name: Deal Closed
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a deal is marked closed.

Notifications.Name: Deal Deleted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a deal is deleted.

Notifications.Name: Menu Presented
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when the menu presentation is completed for a deal.

Notifications.Name: New Credit App Submitted
Notifications.Description: This notification is sent when a new credit application is submitted by a customer.
